articles.title: Photo album made in S. Korea
articles.content:
Photo album made in S. Korea 
    Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- A cameraman in Taejon, South Korea, made a photo album "The Sun Shines All Over The World" on the occasion of the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il, Seoul-based radio Voice of National Salvation reported.
 Printed on the front cover of the album is the sunrise on Mt. Paektu, a holy mountain of revolution.  Written in the preface are letters reading "gift to patriotic people revering general Kim Jong Il, the peerlessly great man, on the occasion of the February holiday." His portrait is also placed on the first page.   
 Edited in the album are photos of him conversing with servicepersons and people during his field guidance to different units and photos showing his revolutionary activities, more than 60 in all.

DPRK women's speed skaters prove successful
articles.content:
DPRK women's speed skaters prove successful 
    Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- DPRK women speed skaters gave a good account of themselves in the international speed skating contest held in Italy.
 Paek Kyong Sun, who took part in the youth a-class short track contest, came first in the 500m and 1,000m events respectively.    
 Rim Chang Gum emerged a runner-up in the youth b-class contest (various events) while Ko Hyon Suk placed third in the youth b-class short track contest.

Greetings to President of Presidency of Bosnia and Herzegovina
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Presidency of Bosnia and Herzegovina
    Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, today sent a message of greetings to Beriz Belkic, President of the Presidency of Bosnia and Herzegovina, on the occasion of its national day.
 The message expressed belief that the relations between the two countries would develop in the interests of the two peoples and wished the president and people of Bosnia and Herzegovina success in the work for the stability and reconstruction of the country.
